tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE palm_vein_recognition (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INT,
    palm_vein_data BYTEA,
    recognition_result BOOLEAN,
    attendance_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    FOREIGN KEY (user_id) REFERENCES user_profiles(id)
);

CREATE TABLE palm_vein_recognition_results (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    palm_vein_data TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE user_profiles (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    full_name VARCHAR(100),
    email VARCHAR(100)
)

CREATE TABLE attendance_tracking (
    user_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    check_in_time TIMESTAMP,
    check_out_time TIMESTAMP
)
